author: jonesde
msg: Change to adjust for Derby bug with null values in a unique index; this setting just turns off the unique part of maually declared indices when set, as it is now by default for Derby; now the seed data loading and other things will work though WARNING: unique indices will not work with Derby; we don't use these much but we need to watch for it in testing

author: nbubna
msg: miscellaneous style, layout, and content improvements
